details: WordPress Developer skilled in designing, developing, and managing multiple websites using WordPress.
Optimized content for websites, blogs, ads, and various digital platforms as required.
Assisted in generating content based on the monthly editorial calendar to boost sales, and highlight blogs.
Collaborated with the team to develop weekly social media strategies.
Improved online visibility through keyword research, content optimization, and analytics learning.
Collaborated with the team to formulate impactful SEO strategies.
Skilled in email marketing software, CSS, HTML, campaign management, strategies, and planning.
Proficient in email A/B testing, optimizing campaigns, and creative development.
